attributes.action: Give London the chance to become a independent, self-governing nation
attributes.additional_details:
After seeking independence we would immediately apply to join the European Union (EU), which is what 60% of London citizens want. London is different than many other parts in the UK, this has been confirmed by the Brexit Referendum and UK General Election 2017.
For more information visit @londependence  on Twitter
attributes.background: Give the city of London a chance to become an independent and self-governing nation, similar to the Scottish Nationalist campaign. 60% of London citizens voted to remain in the European Union, we believe it is only right to give them that chance again.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you'd like a referendum on independence for London, you could start a new petition asking for that.
